quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
Ability to find the answers is more important than ability to know the answers.
Discipline is the refining fire by which talent becomes ability.
Positive thinking will let you use the ability which you have, and that is awesome.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
Power is the ability to get things done.
Ability means all of us finding our strengths and putting them to full use.
You have this ability to find beauty in weird places.
Ability is a light bulb. If you don't turn it on, it will never shine.
Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
To realize your potential you must look beyond the end of yourself, realizing that where you end is most likely where you actually begin.
Focus on your strength and maximum its potential.
You have great talent for great contribution to humanity.
You are amazing person with unique talents. Have faith in your abilities.

Focusing on who you are, and pursuing opportunities to improve your abilities, allows you to be in acceptance of yourself. This makes you a beautiful person who could care less about what others think of you.
Acting is the ability to live truthfully under the given imaginary circumstances.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
Natural abilities are like natural plants; they need pruning by study.
A man with ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.
Ability may get you to the top, but it takes character to keep you there.
The ability to speak exactly is intimately related to the ability to know exactly.
Ability is the art of getting credit for all the home runs somebody else hits.
The ability to be in the present moment is a major component of mental wellness.
Great ability develops and reveals itself increasingly with every new assignment.
Ability is commonly found to consist mainly in a high degree of solemnity.
The ability to relax and be mindfully present in the moment comes naturally when we are grateful.
The ability to forgive is one of man's greatest achievements.
A special skill, like speaking several languages, or keeping your mouth shut in one.
If you believe you can do something, then you can acquire the ability to do it even if you didn't have it in the beginning.
Our natural gifts and abilities are limited, but when augmented by inspiration and guidance of the Holy Ghost, our potential increases many fold.
Strength of character means the ability to overcome resentment against others, to hide hurt feelings, and to forgive quickly.
Perseverance is the ability to hold our course over time in the face of opposition.
Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
The ability to convert ideas to things is the secret of outward success.
A man of ability and the desire to accomplish something can do anything.
